controller

Class PVPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameController
      • controller.PVPlayer

  • public class PVPlayer
extends GameController
    This controller class will set up the game with the players after they enter their user name and click on "start game" it will then relay the game setup to the gui.
    Author:
    manu
